CustomField.formula:
IF(LEN(Apttus_QPConfig__PriceListId__c) > 0 && NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'sCRM', IF((($Permission.CPQPricingManager || $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator') && ISPICKVAL(NokiaCPQ_Portfolio__c,'Nokia Software')), ("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=GridViewCartPricing&useDealOptimizer=true"& "&cntrNbr_1=" &Direct_Price_List_Number__c &"&mode=readOnly" ), IF((Is_List_Price_Only__c), ("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=GSS List Price&useDealOptimizer=true"), IF((Is_List_Price_Only__c=FALSE && ISPICKVAL(NokiaCPQ_Portfolio__c ,'IP Routing') || ISPICKVAL(NokiaCPQ_Portfolio__c ,'Optics')|| ISPICKVAL(NokiaCPQ_Portfolio__c , 'Nuage')), ("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=ION Direct Pricing Quote&useDealOptimizer=true"& "&cntrNbr_1=" &Direct_Price_List_Number__c &"&mode=readOnly"), IF((Is_List_Price_Only__c=FALSE && ISPICKVAL(NokiaCPQ_Portfolio__c ,'Fixed Network')), ("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=Direct FN Flow&useDealOptimizer=true"& "&cntrNbr_1=" &Direct_Price_List_Number__c &"&mode=readOnly"), ("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=GridViewCart" & "&cntrNbr_1=" &Direct_Price_List_Number__c &"&mode=readOnly") ) ) ) )
,NULL)
CustomField.label: View Products/Pricing Direct Button
